attributes.additional_details:
With the Stop Kony campaign gathering staggering speed in America. It is only right that we raise the awareness here in the UK.
This petition to ask for our Government to make the same commitment America has to stopping the LRA leader Kony. We ask for our Government to send a handful of troops to assist in the arrest of this monster. We ask our government to aid the people of Uganda, Sudan, DRC and other countries who have suffered at his hands.
